00028 #ifndef __PTL_QUEUE_H__
00029 #define __PTL_QUEUE_H__
00030 
00031 /* A Single Queue Element */
00032 struct ptl_q_element {
00033         void *value; // value of this element
00034         struct ptl_q_element *next; // next element in this list
00035         struct ptl_q_element *prev; // previous element in this list
00036 };
00037         
00038 /* Essential Data Elements */
00039 struct ptl_q {
00040         char *type; // string description of this queue (array, linked, etc.)
00041         long capacity; // total capacity (may be used to restrict size)
00042         long size; // current size
00043         struct ptl_q_element *head; // first element
00044         struct ptl_q_element *tail; // last element
00045         void *functions;
00046         /*struct ptl_q_funcs *functions;*/ // functions used to operate on the queue
00047  };
00048 
00049 /* Functions Pointers */
00050 struct ptl_q_funcs {
00056         int (*add)(struct ptl_q, void *);
00057 
00062         int (*add_wait)(struct ptl_q, void *, long);
00063 
00068         void (*clear)(struct ptl_q);
00069 
00074         void* (*peek)(struct ptl_q);
00075 
00081         void *(*get)(struct ptl_q);
00082 
00088         void *(*get_wait)(struct ptl_q, long);
00089 
00090 };
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094 
00095 
00096 
00097 typedef struct ptl_q* ptl_q_t;
00098 typedef struct ptl_q_funcs* ptl_q_funcs_t;
00099 typedef struct ptl_q_element* ptl_q_element_t;
00100 
00101 /* Public Functions */
00102  
00106 ptl_q_t create_queue(ptl_q_funcs_t q_functions);
00107 
00108 ptl_q_element_t create_element(void *value);
00114 void destroy_queue(ptl_q_t q);
